title: New Update: Can We Help Her Make Her Ex Jealous With This Guy?
description:
A few months ago, we helped our listener Allison with a Texting Tutor. She was planning on attending a wedding and knew her ex was going to be there. She wanted to make her ex jealous by bringing her coworker to the wedding as her date.
He accepted her offer, and they had a great time together. But after seeing her ex, she started to have feelings for him again.
Did they get back together or not? We have an update!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
